D

DiceGame - package DiceGame
 
DiceGame - Class in me.charlie.Game
The DiceGame class uses the players/pirates current score and players turn score The player simply does one roll before asking the player if they would like to roll again the pirate turn will keep rolling the dice untill it decides to stop or gets a failed roll
DiceGame(int) - Constructor for class me.charlie.Game.DiceGame
 
DiceGameLossWindow - Class in DiceGame
The loss window is activated when the pirates win the dice game, it is called from diceGameManager
DiceGameLossWindow() - Constructor for class DiceGame.DiceGameLossWindow
Create the application.
DiceGameLossWindow(DiceGameManager) - Constructor for class DiceGame.DiceGameLossWindow
Create the application.
DiceGameManager - Class in DiceGame
DiceGameManager controls and stores the variables required to play the dice game It launches each of the corresponding windows in accordance to what is required when the game is over it will carry on the game if the player wins or enact the penalty if they lose if they can't afford the penalty it will launch the gameOver screen.
DiceGameManager(GameManager, Game, Route, int, DiceGame) - Constructor for class DiceGame.DiceGameManager
creates an instance of DiceGameManger
DiceGameRollWindow - Class in DiceGame
Creates a summary of the players last roll, current turn value, current total score and pirates current total score Provides options to the player to lock in their current turn score or roll again
DiceGameRulesWindow - Class in DiceGame
when the dice game launches this window opens to explain the rules and flow of the game
DiceGameRulesWindow(DiceGameManager) - Constructor for class DiceGame.DiceGameRulesWindow
Create the application.
DiceGameVictoryWindow - Class in DiceGame
displays a window showing the players last roll and their total score when they win the game when the button is clicked the game carries on and they arrive at their destination
DiceGameVictoryWindow() - Constructor for class DiceGame.DiceGameVictoryWindow
 
DiceGameVictoryWindow(DiceGameManager, DiceGame) - Constructor for class DiceGame.DiceGameVictoryWindow
Create the application.
disableConfirm() - Method in class me.charlie.Gui.Main.ShipUpgradeScreen
Disables the confirm button.
doesEventOccur() - Method in class me.charlie.RandomEvents.RandomEvent
Gets a random double between 0 and 1 and checks if it is smaller than the RandomEvent's RandomEventRarity.
DROWNING_SAILORS - me.charlie.RandomEvents.RandomEventType
